channel.title: Need help with the portforwarding due to my router?
channel.description:
hey i am having real bad difficulties with the portforwarding part.... on the actual website what game shall i use because 'mopar' or 'silab' aint on the list.
also i have a Siemens Gigaset SE 587 Router and when i go to 'games and applications' and type in the local and public port 43594 and my DEFAULT and computer ip and none of them work.
someone please help me???
[img]http://C:\Documents and Settings\Curtis\My Documents\My Pictures\1[/img]
[img]http://C:\Documents and Settings\Curtis\My Documents\My Pictures\cmd[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2008, 12:05:27 pm[/size][hr]anyone????

item.title: Need help with the portforwarding due to my router?
item.dc:creator: @Problem Problem
item.description:
@Problem wrote:

U / Bittorrent notrecommed…

Try if you got there :

Security , then Addres Translation, then Pass by port , then add custom port , then add port 43594 - 43594 and apply…

I dont think you have it but i got other Siemens and there it got like that… Hope u got too
Good luck.

Read full topic
